descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffff00][size=5]
[color=#ffffff][color=#ffff00]Blade of Intrigue[/color] for Skyrim v1.0 Eng/Rus[/color][/size][/color][/font][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffff00][size=5][color=#ffffff][size=4]
!!![color=#00ffff]THIS MOD IS TOTALLY SE-COMPATIBLE[/color]!!!

[/size][/color][/size][/color][/font][/center][font=Times New Roman][size=3][color=#1e84cc]
[/color][color=#ffff00]Author:[/color]
Ronnie Magnum - meshes, textures

[color=#ffff00]Requirements:[/color]
Skyrim v1.9

[color=#ffff00]Description:[/color]
This mod adds new weapon - Blade of Intrigue - that can be obtained in a Nordic tomb near Deep Folk Crossing location. This weapon have no echantment and can be improved with Corundum ingot.


[center][/center]
[color=#ffff00]Sword stats:[/color]
Type: 1H sword.
Weight: 10
Damage: base 12, crit. 7
Enchantment: None.
Reach: 1,0 (standard sword reach).
Speed: 1,0 (standard sword speed).
Improvement: 1 Corundum ingot, required perk - Elven smithing.

[center][/center]
[color=#ffff00]Also:[/color]

Wanna see my another Skyrim mods? Check my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2931683]Skyrimnexus page[/url].

Join me on my [url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/RonnieMagnumModsAndOther/]Facebook group[/url] to be updated about my upcoming mods.

On my [url=http://ronnietheblacksmith.deviantart.com/]Deviantart page[/url]...

Or join me on Patreon if you like my works!
